reviewText: My 10 year daughter loves these shows
I've always loved Full House. It's a great show that isn't full of the garbage that's on today's shows. Real, quality entertainment that teaches value and realistic life lessons.

This is a great family watch..children and adults will get quicky attached to the characters, my daughter especially loves little Michelle.

Although this was a US programme, my daughter loves it and if you are able to view Region 1 DVDs, this is definitely a series to put on your wish list. Enjoy

I bought Full House Seasons 1-4 for my 8 year old daughter.  She loves them!  The story lines give her something she can relate to, and are done with humor she can understand and get a good chuckle out of. My 6 year old daughter can also relate. It teaches kids good life lessons. Little Michelle is soooo cute. It's a good family oriented show that the whole family can sit down and enjoy together.  I'd highly recommend Full House to anyone looking for something for the whole family to watch.  Can't wait to get the rest of the series.
This is what I had been looking for and my giftee just loved the present.

We just love these Full House DVD's.  My daughter and I have watched them, basically non stop, since Christmas Day!!

Enjoy them as we have too!
